posts.post_title: F/S..12 - T206 Southern Leaguers....2 still available
posts.post_content:
For sale....12 - Southern Leaguers....sold individually, or in lots.

First group of 6 cards have clean backs (shown below)......prices reduced.

The 2nd group of 6 cards have varying degrees of back damage.
 

Prices for the 1st group........
 
$140........Bay......Vg (lower left corner crease).............SALE PENDING
$175........Jordan......Vg-Ex (no creases)......................SALE PENDING
$180........Mullaney......Vg-Ex (no creases)
$190........Persons......Vg-Ex (no creases)
$200........Sid Smith......Vg-Ex (no creases)...................SALE PENDING
$110........Westlake......Vg (minor crease across cap)......SALE PENDING


Prices for the 2nd group........

$60........Howard (Piedmont)......G-Vg...........................SALE PENDING
$60........King (Piedmont)......G-Vg
$40........Miller (Old Mill)......G (punch holes)
$60........Seitz (Piedmont)......G-Vg..............................SALE PENDING
$40........Thornton (Old Mill)......G
$60........Westlake (Piedmont)......G-Vg


Contact me at......tedzan11@comcast.net
